title: Cannot Q up and chat is not connected.Problem loggin in. Why?

replies.body:
When you go to queue up into a match, what happens exactly?  Are you seemingly booted from the lobby or never allowed to join?  Or do you get some sort of other error message?

Feel free to reply back and let me know!

Thank you for your response. It seems many people were having issues with the client bugging out that day.
After 4-5 logins the problem magically fixed itself :)
The problem was when i clicked PLAY, there was no queue and i would return to heme page automatically and the chat never connected too.

well earlier today when i logged in it came up with some error message that i don't remember and i had to reload the stuff on the front page (which worked fine). then it wasn't loading any of my champs or data on my profile and when i hit play i noticed it claimed i didn't have 16 champions which i definitely have. It was weird but when i restarted it it was fine. I think it just somehow didn't connect at all even though i definitely had internet connection and the news and stuff and friends list and stuff loaded fine.
